outputs.output_descr:
·Support the Country Office in assuring consistency between the programmatic and the policy/advocacy level, by:
-Supporting the codification of lessons learned and best practices generated through the implementation of projects, to contribute to a better evidence-based policy making (upstream).
-Assuring that UNDP corporate requirements and country-based priorities are mainstreamed in project implementation (downstream)
·Allocate human and financial resources to the preparation of corporate reporting and the provision of demand-driven ad-hoc policy advisory services, in cooperation with on going or envisaging potential programmatic activities.
